title: Transportation Learning and Student Management Director
status: Full Time, 40 hours per week (239 day calendar)EDUCATION and/or EXPERIENCEMaster's degree in Education and related administrative experience and/or training.CERTIFICATES, LICENSES, REGISTRATIONSMust hold a valid Utah School Leadership License issued by USBE.Must have a valid Utah Commercial Driver's License (CDL) with proper endorsements OR willing to obtain within 90 days of contract start date.The salary for this position is assigned to lane 3 of the AA Salary Schedule.To view the salary schedule, please selet the following linkAA Salary Schedule.Attachment(s):Director of Transportation Learning & Student Management.pdfEmail To A FriendPrint Version
